info.title: WEBHOOK API
info.description:
This section contains operations and models of Lianlian Pay Webhook service. 

Webhook is a common service shared by multiple Lianlian Pay products, and all operations of this service are hosted in China.

Production Endpoint - **global-api.lianlianpay.com**

400.description:
Possible error codes:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| 999995 | \[PARAMETER\] ERROR_MESSAGE |
| 108012 | Duplicate Webhook Registration |

post.description:
Register a webhook in Lianlian Pay system. Registered webhook will be used to send events generated by Lianlian Pay system.

Return type is `Webhook` object

topics.description:
Event topics defined in Lianlian Pay's system.

| Topic | Description |
|--------|------------|
| funding.funded | 如果账单加款成功, 可以查到相应加款流水   |
| tuitionEvidence.approved |当提交申请的留学材料被审核通过时,审核通过后可发送汇兑指令，TuitionInfo.status会变成APPROVED|
| tuitionEvidence.reject |当提交申请的留学材料被审核通过时,审核通过后可发送汇兑指令，TuitionInfo.status会变成REJECT|
| exchange.successed | 汇兑分发指令处理成功,如果只做汇兑ExchangeTrans.status会变成EXCHANGE_SUCCESS，如果要做分发ExchangeTrans.status会变成PAYMENT_SUCCESS|
| exchange.failed | 汇兑分发指令处理失败.ReFundingTrans.status会变成PAYMENT_FAILED|
| refunding.successed|退款成功，ReFundingTrans.status会变成SUCCESS |
| refunding.failed|退款失败，ReFundingTrans.status会变成FAILED|
| exchangereturn.success|退汇成功，ExchangeReturn.status会变成SUCCESS |
| exchangereturn.failed|退汇失败，ExchangeReturn.status会变成FAILED|
| exchangecancel.success|汇兑取消成功，ExchangeTrans.status会变成CANCEL，且ExchangeTrans.cancelStatus会变成SUCCESS|
| exchangecancel.failed|汇兑取消失败，ExchangeTrans.status会变成SUCCESS，且ExchangeTrans.cancelStatus会变成FAILED|
| exchangereturn.failed|退汇失败，ExchangeReturn.status会变成FAILED|
| exchangecancel.success|汇兑取消成功，ExchangeTrans.status会变成CANCEL，且ExchangeTrans.cancelStatus会变成SUCCESS|
| exchangecancel.failed|汇兑取消失败，ExchangeTrans.status会变成SUCCESS，且ExchangeTrans.cancelStatus会变成FAILED|

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description:
**Optional**

A unique value generated by the client which the server uses to recognize subsequent retries of the same request.

get.description:
Get a list of webhook registrations of a client. If no registrations, empty list will be returned.

Return type is List<`Webhook`>

Get a webhook registration details by `webhookId`.

Return type is `Webhook` object

webhook.title: Webhook
webhook.description:
Object used in Lianlian Pay system to describe the client registration of event callbacks.

Lianlian Pay uses this object to identify events which should be pushed back to client's url.

id.description: Webhook registration id in Lianlian Pay's system
